genes.content:
Eliza is a monorepo that contains all the packages needed to run the entire platform.

```
/
â”œâ”€â”€ packages/
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ typescript/     # Core package (@elizaos/core) - agent runtime, bootstrap plugin
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ python/         # Python implementation of the core API
â”‚   â”œâ”€â”€ rust/           # Rust implementation (native + WASM)
â”‚   â””â”€â”€ ...             # Other packages and utilities
â”œâ”€â”€ plugins/            # Official plugins (discord, telegram, openai, etc.)
â”œâ”€â”€ examples/           # Example agents and usage patterns
â””â”€â”€ ...
```

- **`@elizaos/core`**: The core package that provides `AgentRuntime`, the bootstrap plugin, message processing, and basic agent actions.
- **`@elizaos/plugin-sql`**: Database integration (Postgres, PGLite).
- **`plugins/`**: Official plugins for Discord, Telegram, OpenAI,

genes.content:
Get your first AI agent running in just a few steps.

**Prerequisites:**

- [Node.js](https://nodejs.org/) (v23+)
- [bun](https://bun.sh/docs/installation)

> **Note for Windows Users:** [WSL 2](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/wsl/install-manual) is required.
